content:
This isn't RRC specific, but it is big happy news.

https://twitter.com/hackmdio/status/1493413253997035520

GitHub now supports mermaid.js so now the diagrams you written in mermaid on HackMD and synced to GitHub can be displayed properly on GitHub. How to sync HackMD with GitHub: https://hackmd.io/c/tutorials/%2Fs%2Flink-with-github https://twitter.com/hackmdio/status/1493413253997035520/photo/1

- HackMD (@hackmdio)
